p:
If recycling has been seen as essential to the setting up of an effective after-use plastics economy, safety and environmental issues of closed-loop recycling
14 (e.g., bottle-to-bottle for PET) and lack of resilient secondary markets for cascaded recycling
15 (recycling of plastics into other applications than food packaging) level off its development to the current low level. On the whole almost half of PET is not collected for recycling, and only 7% is recycled bottle-to-bottle ( 72).
